t5-7: Good morning! The day's plan starts in the morning, have a wonderful day!
t7-11: Good morning! Is work going well? Don't sit for too long, get up and move around!
t11-14: It's noon, you've worked the morning, it's lunchtime now!
t14-17: It's easy to feel drowsy in the afternoon, have you achieved your exercise goals today?
t17-19: Evening is here! The sunset outside the window is beautiful, nothing is more beautiful than the evening glow~
t19-21: Good evening, how was your day?
t21-23: It's already late, go to bed early, good night~
t23-5: Are you a night owl? It's so late, aren't you going to sleep? Can you wake up tomorrow?

Hey! Are you trying to court death?
Oh my! Get away!
Oh my! Go away!
How annoying! Remove your hand!
Hey! I can bite!
Huh? Do you want to be beaten up?

So shameless! Is it that pleasurable?
Captain's hands are not following orders again?
Not allowed! That's off-limits!

Ah, don't think I don't know, what are you thinking...
Eh? Really, you... forget it.
Unidentified object detected, radar fully activated
Potential threat detected, entering alert mode
Heavy Armored Bunny 19C, unidentified intrusion detected in core body parts
Heavy Armored Bunny 19C, Fire!
Oh no, the enemy has found the blind spot in Heavy Armored Bunny's defense
Huh? Detected another dangerous individual
Full-field detection initiated
Dangerous individual, stay away from me
This is Bronya's neural center, do not touch randomly
Malicious behavior detected, affection index decreasing
Root access to central computer obtained, about to broadcast Captain's actions to the entire ship
Bronya cannot analyze Captain's actions
Enhanced defense in this area, Bronya won't give the enemy a second chance
Bronya received unidentified action instructions

HP3074 file shows that head patting is a subtle expression of comfort, encouragement, or affection,
So, what does Captain want to express?
Abnormal neural waveform detected, seems to represent an unknown emotional change
Captain, what should Bronya do now?
Captain, Bronya detected rising body temperature
Captain's body temperature is 36.8 degrees, exceeds standard by 0.1 degree, within normal range
Defense system has recognized Captain as friendly, Captain won't be attacked
Mom, why did Bronya think of Mom?
Captain, Bronya doesn't know how to express this at the moment
Captain, unknown reasons causing Bronya's body temperature to rise
Captain, if this continues, Bronya's neural center will break down
It seems Heavy Armored Bunny 19C really likes Captain
Bronya's defense mechanism will be permanently deactivated for Captain~
Captain, do you want Bronya to remove the strong armored plating from her legs?
